attributes.action: Release unlawful arrest of British Citizen Mr Izhar Khan from Rangers Military
attributes.additional_details:
no legal document was produced.

We have informed the FCO office We will like to bring back a British Citizen safe and sound.

release of statements in UK can trigger action for rangers to release safe and sound. 

I Fear for the life of Mr Khan-

a member was previously tortured which caused he's death

http://www.dawn.com/news/1256004/dg-rangers-admits-deceased-mqm-worker-was-tortured-during-custody?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+dawn-news+(Dawn+News)
attributes.background:
Mr Izhar Uddin Ahmed Khan, a British national, residence, a member of the MQM a Pakistan based political party with head offices in Edgware.

12/07/16 at 1100 GMT he was visiting a friend’s house, when the Para- Military Rangers forcefully entered the residence, and abducted Mr Khan.

rejection.details: If you’re in the UK and concerned about a British national in Pakistan, you can contact the Foreign and Commonwealth office on on 020 7008 1500. British citizens in Pakistan who urgently need consular assistance can call +92 (0)51 201 2000.
